Chickens are a type of bird kept as livestock by farmers and are often found inside pens in the farms of Gielinor. Chickens are one of the weakest enemies in RuneScape, but are very beneficial for low-level players to kill as they have very low Defence and deal hardly any damage. Any damage taken whilst killing them could be easily mitigated by cooking the raw chicken they are guaranteed to drop on kill. Chickens, like most birds, count for bird Slayer assignments, which are given by the slayer masters Turael and Spria.

Chickens are the primary source of several useful items, such as eggs for Cooking and Summoning, bones for Prayer, feathers for Fishing or Fletching. Because of this, killing chickens can be very profitable for low-level players.

Rarely, a chicken will respawn by falling from the sky and saying, "I have returned". This variant drops the off-hand rubber chicken, which is needed to complete the Slayer collection log.

Universal drops[edit | edit source]

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.
Item Quantity Rarity GE price High Alch
Key token1RareNot soldNot alchemisable
Mimic kill token (m)11/10,00095,216Not alchemisable

Achievement[edit | edit source]

  • Guardian of the Realm ( 0) – Obtained a collection of unique drops from Slayer monsters located within Asgarnia & Misthalin.
    • Cornucopia and off-hand rubber chicken drops

Works[edit | edit source]

Transcripts Chicken is the author or co-author of:
  • Poultry, Dragons and Zombies

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 12 February 2024 (Update):
    • Rebalanced several low level monsters that were harder to kill than intended
  • patch 23 September 2019 (Update):
    • Chickens at the Falador farm, Miscellania and Etceteria have been graphically updated.
  • ninja 5 January 2015 (Update):
    • Chickens' walk animations are now more fluid.
  • update 4 January 2001 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • At RuneFest 2011, chickens were spawned at the Grand Exchange by a Jagex moderator demonstrating how the rotten potato works.
  • A chicken could be found in the basement of the Wizards' Tower before the area received a graphical update on 28 November 2012.
